titles.title: I Am Not My Own (chorus echo takes work)

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I --- am not my own --- (I am not my own - I am not my own) I --- am not my own --- (I am not my own - I am not my own) I belong to Jesus (I belong yes I belong to Jesus) And I am not my own --- (I am I am not my own - my own){/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Tell me not of earthly pleasures Tempt me not with sordid gain Mock me not with earth's illusions Vex me not with honors vain I am weaned from sinful idols I am henceforth not my own I have given my heart to Jesus I belong to Him alone{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}O the blessed rest it brings us To belong to Christ alone We can draw on all His fullness When we've nothing of our own Blessed Jesus take me own me Make me keep me wholly Thine Deign to find in me Thy portion While I joy to call Thee mine{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Weary soul give up the struggle Cease at length thyself to own Give yourself away to Jesus And belong to Him alone Once He gave His all to win thee Now He asks as much of thee All He has He fully gives thee Let thy love His portion be{/lang-eng}
